name: Pavlikova.github.io
body:
#Getting Started

You can find the guidelines to quickly connect your game to Xsolla, along with details on integration. You can also get info on various products and services offered by Xsolla below.

1. Quick start guide
 -  Start with Merchant Dashboard:
 - Register in Merchant Dashboard.
2. Create new project and set up main parameters.
Integrate Xsolla with the SDK
 - Set up a payment page with an embedded PayStation Widget
 - Create an IPN interface on your server using  Standard Protocol. Using the SDK package provided by Xsolla simplifies this process (the SDK is available for PHP and Java - Ruby and Python are coming soon!).
3. Test and launch your new project.
